info.name: Lord of the Rings
info.description:
## _One API to rule them all!_

This is Postman documentation for gitfosh's [LOTR api.](https://the-one-api.dev/)

**This is not official documentation!**

### **Setup:**

1. Click "Run in Postman" button
2. Setup a new account [here](https://the-one-api.dev/sign-up)
3. Copy the access token
4. Edit the "Lord of the Rings API" collection, click on Variables, and paste your access token into the "**current**" value for accessToken

item.name: Books

request.description: List of all "The Lord of the Rings" books
Request all chapters of one specific book

response.name: Get Chapters By Book ID

item.description:
**This folder contains the endpoints for books**

*Note: only the book endpoint is available without authentication.*

item.name: Movies

request.description: List of all movies, including the **"The Lord of the Rings"** and the "**The Hobbit"** trilogies

item.name: Get all movie quotes for specific movie

variable.description: Id of movie(only working for the Lord of the Rings trilogy)

request.description: Request all movie quotes for one specific movie (**only working for the Lord of Rings trilogy**)

response.name: Get all movie quotes for specific movie
response.body:
{
    "docs": [
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced60",
            "dialog": "",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced60"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced61",
            "dialog": "Who is she? This woman you sing of?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced61"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced62",
            "dialog": "Tis the Lady of L'thien. The Elf Maiden who gave her love to Beren ... a mortal.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced62"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced64",
            "dialog": "What are they eating when they can't get hobbit?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced64"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced65",
            "dialog": "What happened to her?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced65"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced66",
            "dialog": "She died.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced66"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced67",
            "dialog": "The power of Isengard is at your command",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced67"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced69",
            "dialog": "Sauron. Lord of the Earth",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced69"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6a",
            "dialog": "Stay close young hobbits.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6b",
            "dialog": "Frodo! Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6c",
            "dialog": "..and are never seen again",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6d",
            "dialog": "Your coming to us, is as the footsteps of doom. You bring great evil here!Ringbearer!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6e",
            "dialog": "Well! Here's one dwarf she won't ensnare so easily! I have the eyes of a hawk, and ears of a fox!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6f",
            "dialog": "Mr Frodo?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced6f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced71",
            "dialog": "The dwarf breathes so loud, we could have shot him in the dark.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd3f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced71"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced73",
            "dialog": "Oh!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced73"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced75",
            "dialog": "Mae govannen, Legolas Thranduilion.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd3f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced75"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced7f",
            "dialog": "My old sword, Sting, Here, take it, take it.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced7f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced80",
            "dialog": "Its so light!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced80"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced82",
            "dialog": "My my old ring. Well I should... very much like to hold it again, one last time.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced82"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced85",
            "dialog": "The Ringbearer is setting out on the quest of Mount Doom and you who travel with him, no oath nor bond is laid to go further than you will, Farewell. Hold to your purpose and may the blessings of elves, and men, and all free folk, go with you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced85"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced86",
            "dialog": "I'm sorry I brought this upon you my boy, I'm sorry that you must carry this burden, I'm sorry for everything",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced86"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced87",
            "dialog": "Yes Yes, Made by the elves you know. The blade glows blue when orcs are close and its times like that my lad, when you have to be extra careful. Here's a pretty thing. Mithril! as light as a feather and as hard as dragon scales. Let me see you put it on, go on.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced87"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced88",
            "dialog": "You are no elf",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced88"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced89",
            "dialog": "Then we are here on a common purpose, friend.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced89"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced8a",
            "dialog": "The shards of Narsil, The blade that cut the Ring from Sauron's hand, Ah!Its still sharp, but no more than a broken heirloom",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced8a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced8b",
            "dialog": "Why do you fear the past. You are Isildur's heir, not Isildur himself. You are not bound to his fate",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced8b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced8f",
            "dialog": "Who are you?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced8f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced92",
            "dialog": "I'm a friend of Gandalf the Grey",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced92"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced95",
            "dialog": "Men of the South are welcome here",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcced95"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf3",
            "dialog": "Build me an army worthy of Mordor",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea5",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf4",
            "dialog": "What orders from Mordor my Lord? What does the Eye command?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf5",
            "dialog": "We have work to do",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf6",
            "dialog": "The trees are strong my Lord. The roots go deep",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf7",
            "dialog": "Rip them all down",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf8",
            "dialog": "This was the great watch tower of Amon",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf9",
            "dialog": "These are for you. Keep them close, I'm going to have a look round, Stay here",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedf9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfa",
            "dialog": "My tomato's burst!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfa"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfb",
            "dialog": "Can I have some bacon?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfc",
            "dialog": "Tomatoes, sausages, nice crispy bacon",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfd",
            "dialog": "OK. Want a tomato Sam?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfe",
            "dialog": "What are you doing?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedfe"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedff",
            "dialog": "Is he going to die?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccedff"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee00",
            "dialog": "He's passing into the Shadow world. He'll soon become a wraith like them.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee00"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee01",
            "dialog": "They're close!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee01"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee02",
            "dialog": "Sam! Do you know the Athelas plant?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee02"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee03",
            "dialog": "Govannas v'n gwennen le, Haldir o L'rien.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee03"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee04",
            "dialog": "A, Aragorn in D'nedain istannen le ammen.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd3f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee04"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee05",
            "dialog": "Look Frodo. It's Mr Bilbo's trolls",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee05"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee06",
            "dialog": "So much for the legendary courtesy of the Elves! Speak words we can also understand!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee06"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee07",
            "dialog": "Haldir",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee07"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee08",
            "dialog": "He's going cold!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee08"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee09",
            "dialog": "We have not had dealings with the dwarves, since the dark days.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd3f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee09"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0a",
            "dialog": "",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0b",
            "dialog": "That! was not so courteous!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0c",
            "dialog": "Saved some for you Mr Frodo",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0d",
            "dialog": "Boe ammen veriad l'n. Andelu i ven!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0e",
            "dialog": "Andelu i ven.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0f",
            "dialog": "Frodo, come and help an old man,How's your shoulder?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee0f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee11",
            "dialog": "You bring great evil with you,You can go no further!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd3f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee11"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee13",
            "dialog": "Aragorn!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd3f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee13"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee15",
            "dialog": "Merin le telim.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee15"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee20",
            "dialog": "Mr Frodo?, Frodo! Frodo! I thought I'd lost you",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee20"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee22",
            "dialog": "It's just something Gandalf said.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee22"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee23",
            "dialog": "What are you talking about?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee23"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee24",
            "dialog": "What did he say?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee24"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee26",
            "dialog": "The Fellowship awaits the Ringbearer.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee26"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee27",
            "dialog": "Left.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee27"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee28",
            "dialog": "Move your feet",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee28"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee29",
            "dialog": "Mordor, Gandalf, is it left or right?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee29"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2a",
            "dialog": "Thanks",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2b",
            "dialog": "We must hold this course west of the Misty Mountains for forty days. If our luck holds the Gap of Rohan will still be open to us. and there are road turns east to Mordor.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2c",
            "dialog": "You look good Pippin",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2d",
            "dialog": "ARGH!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2e",
            "dialog": "Good, very good.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2f",
            "dialog": "Get him!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee2f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee30",
            "dialog": "No Gimli, I would not take the road through Moria unless I had no other choice.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee30"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee31",
            "dialog": "Gentlemen, that's enough!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee31"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee32",
            "dialog": "The same blood flows in my veins, The same weakness",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee32"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee33",
            "dialog": "Your time will come. You will face the same evil and you will defeat it A si i-Dh'ath '-orthor, Aragorn. ' or le a ' or nin.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee33"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee34",
            "dialog": "For the Shire. Hold him, hold him down Merry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee34"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee35",
            "dialog": "Sorry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee35"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee36",
            "dialog": "If anyone was to ask for my opinion, which I note that they're not, I'd say that we were taking the long way round. Gandalf, we could pass through the Mines of Moria. My cousin Balin would give us a royal welcome.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee36"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee37",
            "dialog": "Renech i lu i erui govannen?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee37"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee38",
            "dialog": "and to that I hold. I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee38"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee39",
            "dialog": "I choose a mortal life",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee39"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3a",
            "dialog": "You cannot give me this",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3b",
            "dialog": "It is mine to give to whom I will. Like my heart",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3c",
            "dialog": "Strangers from distant lands, friends of old. You have been summoned here to answer the threat of Mordor. Middle Earth stands upon the brink of destruction. None can escape it. You will unite or you will fall. Each race is bound to this fate, this one doom. Bring forth the Ring, Frodo",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3d",
            "dialog": "So it's true",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3e",
            "dialog": "Nauthannem i ned ol reniannen.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3f",
            "dialog": "Gwenwin in enninath...U-arnech in naeth i si celich. Renech i beth i pennen?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee3f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee40",
            "dialog": "You said you would bind yourself to me,foresaking the immortal life of your people",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee40"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee42",
            "dialog": "In a dream, I saw the Eastern sky grow dark,In the West a pale light lingered A voice was crying, your doom is near at hand, Isildur's bane is found, Isildur's Bane",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee42"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee7f",
            "dialog": "Put it out you fools! Put it out!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee7f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee81",
            "dialog": "Backl you Devils!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee81"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee82",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee82"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee83",
            "dialog": "Oh Sam!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee83"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee84",
            "dialog": "Strider! Help him Strider!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee84"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee85",
            "dialog": "He's been stabbed by a Morgul blade. This is beyond my skill to heal. He needs elvish medicine",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee85"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee86",
            "dialog": "Hurry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee86"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee87",
            "dialog": "It's six days from Rivendell! He'll never make it!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee87"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee88",
            "dialog": "Frodo Frodo",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee88"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee89",
            "dialog": "GANDALF!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee89"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8a",
            "dialog": "Well that's nice! That's nice! Ash on my tomatoes!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8b",
            "dialog": "Athelas?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8c",
            "dialog": "Go!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8d",
            "dialog": "Kingsfoil",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8e",
            "dialog": "Kingsfoil, aye, its a weed!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee8e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee90",
            "dialog": "What's this? a Ranger caught off his guard?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee90"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee91",
            "dialog": "Frodo",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee91"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee92",
            "dialog": "She's an elf!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee92"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee93",
            "dialog": "He's fading",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee93"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee94",
            "dialog": "He's not going to last. We must get him to my father.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee94"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee95",
            "dialog": "It may help to slow the poison. Hurry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee95"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee96",
            "dialog": "Dartho guin perian. Rych le ad tolthathon.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee96"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee97",
            "dialog": "Who is she?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee97"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee98",
            "dialog": "Andelu i ven.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee98"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee99",
            "dialog": "Frodo Im Arwen. Telin le thaed. Lasto beth nin. Tolo dan na galad",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee99"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9a",
            "dialog": "I've been looking for you for two days. There are five wraiths behind you, where the other four are I do not know",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9b",
            "dialog": "Hon mabathon. Rochon ellint im.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9c",
            "dialog": "I amar prestar aen Han mathon ne nen Han mathon ne chae A han noston ned gwilith Much that once was is lost. For none now live who remember it.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9d",
            "dialog": "It began with the forging of the Great Rings.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccee9d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea0",
            "dialog": "Better than it was.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea1",
            "dialog": "and the Ring?, You feel its power growing don't you. I've felt it too. You must be careful now. Evil will be drawn to you from outside the Fellowship and I fear from within.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea2",
            "dialog": "Who then do I trust?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea3",
            "dialog": "You must trust to yourself. Trust your own strength.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea4",
            "dialog": "What do you mean?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea6",
            "dialog": "There are many powers in this world for good or for evil. Some are greater than I am and against some I have not yet been tested",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea7",
            "dialog": "Ah! The walls of Moria!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea8",
            "dialog": "Dwarf doors are invisible when closed",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea9",
            "dialog": "Three were given to the elves. Immortal, wisest and fairest of all beings. Seven to the dwarf lords, great miners and craftsmen of the mountain halls. And nine, nine rings were gifted to the race of men. Who above all else, desire power.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceea9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeab",
            "dialog": "It reads \"The Doors of Durin, Lord of Moria, Speak Friend and Enter\"",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeab"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeac",
            "dialog": "What do you suppose that means?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeac"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceead",
            "dialog": "Oh it's quite simple. If you are a friend, you speak the password and the doors will open, Annon Edhellen, edro hi ammen! (",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceead"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeae",
            "dialog": "Fennas Nogothrim, lasto beth lammen.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeae"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeb1",
            "dialog": "Ach!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeb1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeb2",
            "dialog": "Why doesn't that surprise me!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeb2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeb7",
            "dialog": "Yes Gimli! Their own masters cannot find them, if their secrets are forgotten!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeb7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec1",
            "dialog": "Frodo! Merry! Its Frodo Baggins!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec2",
            "dialog": "Hello Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec3",
            "dialog": "Get off him! Frodo, are you alright?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec4",
            "dialog": "What's the meaning of this?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec5",
            "dialog": "Hold these",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec6",
            "dialog": "You've been into Farmer Maggot's crop!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec8",
            "dialog": "Don't you lose him Samwise Gamgee and I don't mean to.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec9",
            "dialog": "Hoi! You get back here! Wait till I get this through you! Get out of my fields! You'll know the devil if I catch up with you!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd90",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceec9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeca",
            "dialog": "Dunno why he's so upset! Its only a couple of carrots",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeca"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecb",
            "dialog": "Sam! We're still in The Shire. What could possibly happen!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecc",
            "dialog": "What is that?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecd",
            "dialog": "Nothing, its just a whisp of cloud",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceece",
            "dialog": "Its moving fast.... against the wind",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceece"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecf",
            "dialog": "Crebain! From Dudland!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceecf"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed0",
            "dialog": "Hide!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed1",
            "dialog": "Hurry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed2",
            "dialog": "You've got my arm... argh!... you've got my arm",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed3",
            "dialog": "and some cabbages and those few bags of potatoes that we lifted last week. And the mushrooms the week before.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed4",
            "dialog": "Frodo! Take cover!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed5",
            "dialog": "Spies of Saruman. The passage south is being watched, We must take the Pass of Caradhras",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed6",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed7",
            "dialog": "Boromir",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed8",
            "dialog": "It is a strange fate that we should suffer so much fear and doubt over so small a thing,such a little thing",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed9",
            "dialog": "Boromir! Give the Ring to Frodo",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceed9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeda",
            "dialog": "and these",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeda"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedb",
            "dialog": "as you wish! I care not",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedc",
            "dialog": "Boromir!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedd",
            "dialog": "Ash nazg durbatul'k, ash nazg gimbatul ash nazg thrakatul'k,agh burzum-ishi krimpatul.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceede",
            "dialog": "Never before has anyone uttered words of that tongue here in Imladris",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceede"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedf",
            "dialog": "I do not ask your pardon Master Elrond for the Black Speech of Mordor may yet be heard in every corner of the West, The Ring is altogether evil",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceedf"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee0",
            "dialog": "Aragorn! This.. is Isildur's heir",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee1",
            "dialog": "and heir to the throne of Gondor",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee2",
            "dialog": "You cannot wield it. None of us can, The One Ring answers to Sauron alone. It has no other master",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee3",
            "dialog": "Havo dad, Legolas!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee4",
            "dialog": "Gondor has no King. Gondor needs no King",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee5",
            "dialog": "Aragorn is right. We cannot use it",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee6",
            "dialog": "You have only one choice. The Ring must be destroyed.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee7",
            "dialog": "Aye it is a gift!A gift to the foes of Mordor. Why not use this Ring?, Long has my father, the Steward of Gondor kept the forces of Mordor at bey. By the,of our people are your lands kept safe. Give Gondor the weapon of the enemy, let us use it against him",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee8",
            "dialog": "and what would a ranger know of this matter?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee9",
            "dialog": "The Ring cannot be destroyed, Gimli, son of Gloin, by any craft that we here possess. The Ring was made in the fires of Mount Doom. Only there can it be unmade. It must be taken deep into Mordor and cast back into the firey chasm from whence it came. One of you........... must do this",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceee9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeed",
            "dialog": "Then what are we waiting for",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceeed"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef19",
            "dialog": "Gwaihir go! Gwaihir",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef19"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1b",
            "dialog": "What are they saying?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1c",
            "dialog": "There's been some strange folk crossing the Shire. Dwarves, others of a less than savoury nature",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1d",
            "dialog": "",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1e",
            "dialog": "War's brewing. The mountains are fair teeming with goblins.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfdc6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1f",
            "dialog": "Children's stories that's all that is. You're beginning to sound like that old Bilbo Baggins! Cracked he was!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfdf1",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef1f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef20",
            "dialog": "",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef20"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef21",
            "dialog": "Hello, Hello, Fatty Bolger, Lovely to see you, Welcome, Welcome",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef21"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef22",
            "dialog": "Go on Sam, ask Rosie for a dance.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef22"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef24",
            "dialog": "Frodo f'r. Ae athradon i hir, tur gwaith nin beriatha hon.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc07",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef24"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef29",
            "dialog": "For within these rings was bound the strength and will to govern each race. But they were all of them deceived. For another ring was made. In the land of Mordor, in the fires of Mount Doom (the dark Lord Sauron forged in secret a master Ring, to control all others and into this Ring he poured all his cruelty, his malice, and his will to dominate all life. One Ring to rule them all.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef29"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef2a",
            "dialog": "One by one the free lands of Middle Earth fell to the power of the Ring. But there were some who resisted. A last alliance of Elves and Men marched against the armies of Mordor. And on the slopes of Mount Doom they fought for the freedom of Middle Earth.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef2a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef2e",
            "dialog": "Tangado haid!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef2e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef2f",
            "dialog": "Sauron, the enemy of the Free Peoples of Middle Earth was defeated. The Ring passed to Isildur. Who had this one chance to destroy evil forever. But the hearts of Men are easily corrupted. And the Ring of Power has a will of its own.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef2f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef30",
            "dialog": "It betrayed Isildur,to his death. And some things that should not have been forgotten were lost. History became legend, legend became myth and for two and a half thousand years the Ring passed out of all knowledge. Until, when chance came, it ensnared a new bearer.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef30"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef31",
            "dialog": "My Precious!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe9e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef31"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef32",
            "dialog": "The Ring came to the creature Gollum who took it deep into the tunnels of the Misty Mountains. And there it consumed him.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef32"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef33",
            "dialog": "It came to me, my own, my love, my own, my Precious.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe9e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef33"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef34",
            "dialog": "The Ring brought to Gollum unnatural long life. For five hundred years it poisoned his mind. And in the gloom of Gollum's cave it waited. Darkness crept back into the forests of the world. Rumour grew of a shadow in the East, whispers of a nameless fear. And the Ring of Power perceived. Its time had now come. It abandoned Gollum. But something happened then that the Ring did not intend, it was picked up by the most unlikely creature imaginable.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef34"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef35",
            "dialog": "Victory was near. But the power of the Ring, could not be undone.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef35"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef36",
            "dialog": "Leithio i philinn!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfcc8",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef36"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef37",
            "dialog": "It was in this moment, that Isildur, son of the King, took up his father's sword.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef37"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef3a",
            "dialog": "A Hobbit. Bilbo Baggins of the Shire.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef3a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef3b",
            "dialog": "What's this?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef3b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef46",
            "dialog": "Nothing's happening",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef46"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef48",
            "dialog": "What're you going to do then?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef48"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4b",
            "dialog": "I once knew every spell in all the tongues of elves, men and orcs",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4c",
            "dialog": "BuBye Bill",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4d",
            "dialog": "Go on, go on, don't worry Sam. He knows the way home.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4e",
            "dialog": "Do not disturb the water",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4f",
            "dialog": "Oh it's useless",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef4f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef50",
            "dialog": "It's a riddle!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef50"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef51",
            "dialog": "Speak friend... and enter. What's the elvish word for friend?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef51"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef52",
            "dialog": "Mel..lon",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef52"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef53",
            "dialog": "Ando Eldarinwa'a lasta quettanya, Fenda Casarinwa'",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef53"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef55",
            "dialog": "Knock your head against these doors Peregrin Took! and if that does not shatter them and I'm allowed a little peace from foolish questions I will try to find the opening words.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef55"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef5a",
            "dialog": "The Mines are no place for a pony even one so brave as Bill.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef5a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef64",
            "dialog": "Yes Pippin, my point is, he's clearly over reacting! Run!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef64"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef65",
            "dialog": "What? It was just a detour. A shortcut",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef65"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef66",
            "dialog": "A shortcut to what?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef66"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef67",
            "dialog": "Mushrooms!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef67"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef68",
            "dialog": "I think we should get off the road.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef68"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef69",
            "dialog": "Oh! I think I've broken something",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef69"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6a",
            "dialog": "Get off the road! Quick!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6b",
            "dialog": "Ssh.. be quiet",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6c",
            "dialog": "Trust a Brandybuck and a Took!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6d",
            "dialog": "Ooh! that was close!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6e",
            "dialog": "What is going on?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6f",
            "dialog": "So Gandalf, you try to lead them over Caradhras. And if that fails, where then will you go?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef6f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef70",
            "dialog": "If the mountain defeats you will you risk a more dangerous road",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef70"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef71",
            "dialog": "Cuiva nwalca Carnirasse; nai yarvaxea rasselya!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef71"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef72",
            "dialog": "Anything?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef72"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef73",
            "dialog": "Nothing",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef73"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef74",
            "dialog": "There is a fell voice on the air",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef74"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef75",
            "dialog": "It's Saruman!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef75"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef76",
            "dialog": "What was that!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef76"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef77",
            "dialog": "We must get off the mountain! Make for the Gap of Rohan and take the west road to my city!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef77"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef78",
            "dialog": "The Gap of Rohan takes us too close to Isengard!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef78"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef79",
            "dialog": "If we cannot pass over the mountain, let us go under it! Let us go through the Mines of Moria",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef79"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7a",
            "dialog": "Moria... you fear to go into those mines.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7b",
            "dialog": "the dwarves delved too greadily and too deep",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7c",
            "dialog": "You know what they woke in the dark of Khazad-d'm",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7d",
            "dialog": "No! Losto Caradhras, sedho, hodo, nuitho i 'ruith!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7e",
            "dialog": "He's trying to bring down the mountain! Gandalf! We must turn back!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7f",
            "dialog": "Cuiva nwalca Carnirasse; Nai yarvaxea rasselya; taltuva notto-carinnar!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef7f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef80",
            "dialog": "and I suppose you think you're the one to do it.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef80"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef81",
            "dialog": "and if we fail what then?, What happens when Sauron takes back what is his?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef81"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef82",
            "dialog": "I will be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an elf",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef82"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef83",
            "dialog": "Never trust an elf",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef83"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef84",
            "dialog": "Do you not understand that while we bicker amongst ourselves, Sauron's power grows?! None can escape it! You'll all be destroyed",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef84"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef86",
            "dialog": "Have you heard nothing Lord Elrond has said? The Ring must be destroyed",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef86"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef87",
            "dialog": "One does not simply walk into Mordor. Its black gates are guarded by more than just orcs. There is evil there that does not sleep and the great eye is ever watchful. Tis a barren wasteland, riddled with fire and ash and dust. The very air you breathe is a poisonous fume. Not with ten thousand men could you do this. It is folly",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef87"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef8b",
            "dialog": "Shadow, flame",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea4",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef8b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef9d",
            "dialog": "and proud of it! Cheers Gaffer!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef9d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef9e",
            "dialog": "Cheers",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef9e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef9f",
            "dialog": "Well it's none of our concern what goes on beyond our borders. Keep your nose out of trouble and no trouble will come to you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfdf1",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccef9f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa0",
            "dialog": "Good Night lads",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc8f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa1",
            "dialog": "Good night, sweet maiden of the golden ale!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa2",
            "dialog": "Oi Mind who you're sweet talking!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa3",
            "dialog": "Don't worry Sam, Rosie knows an idiot when she sees one!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa4",
            "dialog": "Does she?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa5",
            "dialog": "Good Night Sam",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa6",
            "dialog": "Is it secret? Is it safe?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa7",
            "dialog": "Ha! What are you doing!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa8",
            "dialog": "Hold out your hand Frodo. Its quite cool. What can you see?, Can you see anything?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefa8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefaa",
            "dialog": "Young Mr Frodo here, he's cracking!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefaa"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefab",
            "dialog": "There are few who can. The language is that of Mordor, which I will not utter here.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
