            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefab"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefac",
            "dialog": "Ah, I think I'll just have another ale.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefac"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefad",
            "dialog": "Oh no you dont, Go on",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefad"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefaf",
            "dialog": "No no! the big one, big one!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefaf"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb0",
            "dialog": "Mrs Bracegirdle, how nice to see you. Welcome welcome. Are all these children yours?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb1",
            "dialog": "Yeah",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc5f",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb2",
            "dialog": "Good gracious you have been productive!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb3",
            "dialog": "Sackville-Bagginses! Quickly! Hide!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb4",
            "dialog": "Oh! Thankyou my boy You're a good lad Frodo. I'm very selfish you know. Yes, I am. Very selfish. I don't know why I took you in after your mother and father died, but it wasn't out of charity. I think it was because, of all my numerous relations, you were the one Baggins that showed real spirit.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb5",
            "dialog": "So there I was at the mercy of three monstrous trolls and they were all arguing amongst themselves about how they were going to cook us. Whether it be turned on a spit or whether they should sit on us one by one and squash us into jelly. They spent so much time arguing the witherto's and whyfor's that the sun's first light cracked open over the top of the trees. Poof! and turned them all into stone!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb6",
            "dialog": "Quickly",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb7",
            "dialog": "No. Well yes, b-b-b but thats not the point. The point is, Frodo, you'll be alright.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb8",
            "dialog": "Nothing. There's nothing, Wait. There are markings, Its some form of Elvish. I can't read it",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefb8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefc1",
            "dialog": "Bilbo have you been at the Gaffers homebrew?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefc1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefc9",
            "dialog": "A Ring!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefc9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefca",
            "dialog": "The 22nd day of September in the year 1400,by Shire reckoning. Bag End, Bagshot Row, Hobbiton, West Farthing, The Shire, Middle Earth. The Third Age of this world.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefca"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefcb",
            "dialog": "Lost! My Precious is lost.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe9e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefcb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefcc",
            "dialog": "For the time will soon come when Hobbits will shape the fortunes of all.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd06",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefcc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefcd",
            "dialog": "Hobbits have been living and farming in the four Farthings of the Shire for many hundreds of years. quite content to ignore and be ignored by the world of the Big Folk. Middle Earth being, after all, full of strange creatures beyond count. Hobbits must seem of little importance, being neither renowned as great warriors, nor counted amongst the very wise.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefcd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefce",
            "dialog": "There and back again, A Hobbit's tale, by Bilbo Baggins. Now, where to begin? Ah, yes. Concerning Hobbits.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefce"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd0",
            "dialog": "Frodo, someone at the door. In fact, it has been remarked by some that Hobbits' only real passion is for food. A rather unfair observation, As we have also developed a keen interest in the brewing of ales,and the smoking of pipeweed. But where our hearts truly lie, is in peace and quiet,and good tilled earth. For all Hobbits share a love of all things that grow. And yes, no doubt to others, our ways seem quaint, But today of all days, it is brought home to me it is no bad thing to celebrate a simple life.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd1",
            "dialog": "Frodo, the door! sticklebacks, where is that boy! FRODO!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd2",
            "dialog": "Hmm hmm hmm hmm, Down from the door where it began, hmm hmm hmm hmm",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd3",
            "dialog": "And I must follow if I can. The road goes ever on and on, down from the door where it began, now far ahead the road has gone, and I must follow if I can.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd4",
            "dialog": "You're late!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefd4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe2",
            "dialog": "Soon Mr Elf, you will enjoy the fabelled hospitality of the dwarves. Roaring fires! Malt Beer! Red Meat off the bone!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe4",
            "dialog": "Nooooo! NOOOOOOOOOOoooooooo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe5",
            "dialog": "A Mine!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe6",
            "dialog": "Goblins!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe7",
            "dialog": "Now get out of here! Get out!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe9",
            "dialog": "This isn't a mine, it's a tomb",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefe9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefea",
            "dialog": "We make for the gap of Rohan. We should never have come here",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefea"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefec",
            "dialog": "This my friend is the home of my cousin Balin and they call it a Mine!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefec"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff6",
            "dialog": "That black rider was looking for something. Or someone (he walks up to Frodo and looks him in the face) Frodo?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff7",
            "dialog": "Get down!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff8",
            "dialog": "I have to leave the Shire. Sam and I must get to Bree",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff9",
            "dialog": "Right. Bucklebury Ferry. Follow me.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceff9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffa",
            "dialog": "Run!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffa"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffb",
            "dialog": "Frodo, this way. Follow me",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffc",
            "dialog": "Follow me. Run!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffd",
            "dialog": "Run Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffe",
            "dialog": "No!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebcceffe"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefff",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccefff"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf000",
            "dialog": "Let the Ringbearer decide",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf000"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf001",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf001"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf002",
            "dialog": "Frodo?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf002"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf003",
            "dialog": "Get the rope Sam",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf003"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf004",
            "dialog": "So be it",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf004"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf005",
            "dialog": "We cannot stay here!This will be the death of the hobbits!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf005"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf007",
            "dialog": "Frodo! Come on!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf007"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf008",
            "dialog": "We will go through the Mines",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf008"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf010",
            "dialog": "Mordor!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf010"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf012",
            "dialog": "In the common tongue it says",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf012"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf013",
            "dialog": "You're supposed to stick it in the ground",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf013"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf014",
            "dialog": "Done!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf014"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf015",
            "dialog": "Outside",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf015"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf016",
            "dialog": "It is in the ground",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf016"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf017",
            "dialog": "It was your idea!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf017"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf018",
            "dialog": "Bilbo! Bilbo! Watch out for the dragon",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf018"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf019",
            "dialog": "Dragon! Nonsense, there hasn't been a dragon in these parts for a thousand years.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf019"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01a",
            "dialog": "That was good!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01b",
            "dialog": "Speech!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01c",
            "dialog": "My dear Bagginses and Boffins, Tooks and Brandybucks, Grubbs, Chubbs, Hornblowers, Bulgers, Bracegirdles, and Proudfoots.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01d",
            "dialog": "PROUDFEET!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf01d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf021",
            "dialog": "Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took! I might have known!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf021"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf025",
            "dialog": "Speech Bilbo",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf025"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf026",
            "dialog": "Lets get another one!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf026"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf02e",
            "dialog": "Its wonderful to see you Gandalf.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf02e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf02f",
            "dialog": "A wizard is never late! Frodo Baggins. Nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf02f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf030",
            "dialog": "You didn't think Id miss your Uncle Bilbo's birthday?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf030"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf033",
            "dialog": "So how is the old rascal? I hear it is going to be a party of special significance?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf033"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf034",
            "dialog": "You know Bilbo he's got the whole place in an uproar.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf034"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf035",
            "dialog": "Half the Shire's been invited. And the rest of them are turning up anyway.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf035"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf036",
            "dialog": "Well that should please him.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf036"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf037",
            "dialog": "To tell you the truth, Bilbo has been acting a bit odd lately. I mean, more than usual. He's taken to locking himself in his study. He spends hours and hours poring over old maps when he thinks I'm not looking.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf037"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf038",
            "dialog": "Where's it gone?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf038"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf039",
            "dialog": "And so life in the Shire goes on, very much as it has this past age. Full of its own comings and goings with change coming slowly, if it comes at all. For things are made to endure in the Shire, passing from one generation to the next. There's always been a Baggins living here under the Hill, in Bag End",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf039"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03a",
            "dialog": "And there always will be.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03b",
            "dialog": "Aaaaah.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03c",
            "dialog": "He's up to something. All right then, keep your secrets!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03d",
            "dialog": "What?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf03d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf049",
            "dialog": "Frodo! Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf049"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04c",
            "dialog": "Strider! Get off him!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04d",
            "dialog": "Aragorn!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04e",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04f",
            "dialog": "Strider!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf04f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf050",
            "dialog": "Into the Mines!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf050"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf051",
            "dialog": "Bilbo had a shirt of mithril rings that Thorin gave him",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf051"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf052",
            "dialog": "Aww that was a Kingly gift",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf052"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf053",
            "dialog": "Yes. I never told him, but its worth was greater than the value of The Shire!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf053"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf054",
            "dialog": "Pippin!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf054"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf055",
            "dialog": "I've no memory of this place",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf055"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf056",
            "dialog": "Are we lost?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf056"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf057",
            "dialog": "We now have but one choice, we must face the long dark of Moria. Be on your guard, there are older and fouler things than orcs in the deep places of the world",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf057"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf058",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf058"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf059",
            "dialog": "The wealth of Moria is not in gold, or jewels, but Mithril",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf059"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05a",
            "dialog": "Come on faster!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05b",
            "dialog": "How far to the nearest crossing?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05c",
            "dialog": "Legolas!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05d",
            "dialog": "Frodo! Come on!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05e",
            "dialog": "The Brandywine Bridge, twenty miles.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05f",
            "dialog": "Come on!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf05f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf060",
            "dialog": "We wish to at the Inn. Our business is our own.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf060"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf061",
            "dialog": "alright young sir, I meant no offence. My job to ask questions after nightfall. There's talk of strange folk abroad. Can't be too careful",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf061"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf062",
            "dialog": "Out of the way! Watch where you're walking!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf062"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf063",
            "dialog": "Excuse me?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf063"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf064",
            "dialog": "Today is my One Hundred and Eleventh birthday!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf064"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf065",
            "dialog": "Happy Birthday!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf065"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf066",
            "dialog": "We're heading for the Prancing Pony.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf066"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf067",
            "dialog": "Hobbits! Four hobbits! What's more out of The Shire by your talk! What business brings you to Bree?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf067"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf068",
            "dialog": "What do you want?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf068"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf069",
            "dialog": "Alas, elevnty-one years is far too short a time to live among such excellent and admirable hobbits. I don't know half of you half as well as I should like and I like less than half of you, half as well as you deserve.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf069"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf06f",
            "dialog": "But I know you have something to do with it.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf06f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf073",
            "dialog": "Good gracious me!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf073"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf074",
            "dialog": "Before you came along we Bagginses were very well thought of.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf074"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf075",
            "dialog": "Indeed?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf075"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf076",
            "dialog": "If you're referring to the incident with the dragon, I was barely involved. All I did was give your uncle a little nudge out of the door.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf076"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf077",
            "dialog": "Whatever you did, you've been officially labelled as a 'disturber of the peace.'",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf077"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf078",
            "dialog": "Oh really?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf078"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf079",
            "dialog": "We never had any adventures, or did anything unexpected.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf079"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07a",
            "dialog": "Gandalf! Gandalf!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07b",
            "dialog": "Hooooraaaay!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07c",
            "dialog": "Gandalf, I'm glad you're back.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07e",
            "dialog": "Fireworks Gandalf! Gandalf! Fireworks Gandalf!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf07e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf089",
            "dialog": "No",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf089"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08a",
            "dialog": "I think we are",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08c",
            "dialog": "Ssh! Gandalf's thinking",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08e",
            "dialog": "Merry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08f",
            "dialog": "What!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf08f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf090",
            "dialog": "I'm hungry",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf090"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf091",
            "dialog": "There's something down there",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf091"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf092",
            "dialog": "It's Gollum",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf092"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf094",
            "dialog": "Gollum!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf094"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf095",
            "dialog": "He's been following us for three days",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf095"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf096",
            "dialog": "He escaped the dungeons of Barad-D'r!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf096"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf097",
            "dialog": "Escaped, or was set loose and now the Ring has drawn him here, He won't ever be rid of his need for it. He hates and loves the Ring, as he hates and loves himself. Smeagol's life is a sad story, Yes, he was once called, before the Ring found him. Before it drove him mad",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf097"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf098",
            "dialog": "Pity? It was pity that stayed Bilbo's hand. Many that live deserve death and many that die, deserve life. Can you give it to them Frodo? Do not be too eager to deal out death and judgement Even the very wise cannot see all ends. My heart tells me that Gollum has some part to play, yet for good or ill.... before this is over. The pity of Bilbo, may rule the fate of many",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf098"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf099",
            "dialog": "Good Evening little masters. What can I do for you? If you're looking for accomodation, we've got some nice, cosy hobbit sized rooms available. Always proud to cater to the little folk, Mr err...?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbdecb6dc0baeae48cfaa5",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf099"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09a",
            "dialog": "Underhill, my name's Underhill",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09b",
            "dialog": "Underhill, yes..",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbdecb6dc0baeae48cfaa5",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09c",
            "dialog": "We're friends of Gandalf the Grey. Can you tell him we've arrived?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09d",
            "dialog": "It's a pity Bilbo didnt kill him when he had the chance",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09e",
            "dialog": "What do we do now?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09f",
            "dialog": "Sam. He'll be here. He'll come.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf09f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a0",
            "dialog": "What's that?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a1",
            "dialog": "This my friend, is a pint!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a2",
            "dialog": "I wish the Ring had never come to me. I wish none of this had happened.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a3",
            "dialog": "It comes in pints?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a4",
            "dialog": "So do all who live to see such times, but that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us. There are other forces at work in this world, Frodo, besides the will of evil. Bilbo was meant to find the Ring, in which case you also were meant to have it and that is an encouraging thought. Oh! Its that way",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a5",
            "dialog": "hmmmhmmm",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a6",
            "dialog": "Gandalf? ,Gandalf? Oh yes! I remember! Elderly chap! Big grey beard, pointy hat. Not seen him for six months.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbdecb6dc0baeae48cfaa5",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a7",
            "dialog": "So am I dear boy. So am I.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a8",
            "dialog": "No thank you! We don't want any more visitors, well wishers or distant relations!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a9",
            "dialog": "That fellow's done nothing but stare at you since we arrived!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0a9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0aa",
            "dialog": "And what about very old friends?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0aa"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ab",
            "dialog": "You've had a whole half already!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ab"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ac",
            "dialog": "Gandalf?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ac"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ad",
            "dialog": "Bilbo Baggins.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ad"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ae",
            "dialog": "I'm getting one!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ae"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0af",
            "dialog": "My dear Gandalf!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0af"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b0",
            "dialog": "It's good to see you. One hundred and eleven years old who would believe it. You haven't aged a day!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b1",
            "dialog": "Come on, come in! Welcome, welcome. Oh, here we are.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b2",
            "dialog": "It was laid down by my father, what say we open one eh?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b3",
            "dialog": "Tea or maybe something a little stronger? I've got a few bottles of the Old Winyard left, 1296, a very good year, almost as old as I am.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b4",
            "dialog": "Just tea, thank you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b5",
            "dialog": "I was expecting you sometime last week. Not that it matters; you come and go as you please. Always have done and always will.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b7",
            "dialog": "Owwwh!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0b7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c5",
            "dialog": "He's remembered",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c6",
            "dialog": "Oh!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c7",
            "dialog": "Gimli!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c8",
            "dialog": "No, no, no",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c9",
            "dialog": "Here lies Balin, son of Fundin, Lord of Moria. He is dead then. Its as I feared.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0c9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ca",
            "dialog": "We must move on, we cannot linger.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ca"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cb",
            "dialog": "They have taken the Bridge and the second hall. We have barred the gates, but cannot hold them for long. The ground shakes. Drums, Drums in the deep. We cannot get out. A shadow moves in the dark. We cannot get out. They are coming.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cc",
            "dialog": "There's an eye-opener and no mistake",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cd",
            "dialog": "Let me risk a little more light, Behold the great realm and dwarf city of Dwarrowdelf.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ce",
            "dialog": "Frodo!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ce"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cf",
            "dialog": "No, but the air doesnt smell so foul down here. If in doubt, Meriadoc, always follow your nose.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0cf"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d0",
            "dialog": "Fool of a Took! Throw yourself in next time, and rid us of your stupidity!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d1",
            "dialog": "He's one of them rangers. They're dangerous folk they are. Wandering the wilds. What his right name is, I've never heard, but round here, he's known as Strider.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbdecb6dc0baeae48cfaa5",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d2",
            "dialog": "Strider",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d3",
            "dialog": "Baggins.... Baggins.... Baggins ....Baggins! Baggins!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d4",
            "dialog": "Baggins? Sure I know a Baggins! He's over there. Frodo Baggins! He's my second cousin once removed on his mother's side, and my third cousin twice removed on his father's side, if you follow me.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d5",
            "dialog": "Pippin!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d6",
            "dialog": "Steady on!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d7",
            "dialog": "Orcs!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd81",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d8",
            "dialog": "Get back! and stay close to Gandalf.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d9",
            "dialog": "Excuse me. That man in the corner. Who is he?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0d9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0da",
            "dialog": "You cannot hide! I see you!There is no life in the void, Only death!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea5",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0da"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0db",
            "dialog": "You draw far too much attention to yourself Mr Underhill!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0db"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0dc",
            "dialog": "A little more caution from you! That is no trinket you carry!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0dc"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0dd",
            "dialog": "What do you want?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0dd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0de",
            "dialog": "Oh!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0de"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0df",
            "dialog": "Just tea, thank you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0df"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e0",
            "dialog": "Oh right. You don't mind if I do, do you?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e0"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e1",
            "dialog": "Oh not at all!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e2",
            "dialog": "Bilbo! Bilbo Baggins!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e3",
            "dialog": "I'm not at home! It's the Sackville-Bagginses.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e3"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e4",
            "dialog": "I know you're in there!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cdbe49b7ed9587226e794a0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e4"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e5",
            "dialog": "You've caught me a bit unprepared I'm afraid urm we've only got cold chicken and a bit of pickle oh and there's some cheese here, oh no that wont do! Urm we've got raspberry jam, an apple tart, but we've not much for afters. Oh no we're all right, I've found some sponge cake! I can make you some eggs if you ' oh'. Gandalf?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e6",
            "dialog": "Indeed, I can avoid being seen if I wish. But to disappear entirely That is a rare gift!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e6"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e7",
            "dialog": "I carry nothing",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e7"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e8",
            "dialog": "So you mean to go through with your plan then?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e8"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e9",
            "dialog": "Of course he does, he's a Baggins, not some blockheaded Bracegirdle from Hardbottle.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0e9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ea",
            "dialog": "You will tell him wont you?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0ea"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f1",
            "dialog": "They're after the house! They've never forgiven me for living this long. I've got to get away from these confounded relatives hanging on the bell all day, never giving me a moment's peace. I want to see mountains again, mountains Gandalf. And then find somewhere quiet where I can finish my book. Oh, tea!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f1"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f2",
            "dialog": "Yes, yes, it's all in hand. All the arrangements are made. Oh, thank you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f2"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f5",
            "dialog": "Frodo suspects something.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f5"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f9",
            "dialog": "They have a cave troll!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc57",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0f9"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fa",
            "dialog": "Agh! Let them come There's one dwarf yet in Moria who still draws breath.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd23",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fa"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fb",
            "dialog": "Pull!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fb"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fd",
            "dialog": "Are you frightened?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fd"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fe",
            "dialog": "Yes",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf0fe"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf100",
            "dialog": "Let him go! Or I'll have you Longshanks!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf100"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf102",
            "dialog": "Who are you?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf102"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf103",
            "dialog": "Not nearly frightened enough. I know what hunts you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf103"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf104",
            "dialog": "You have a stout heart little hobbit! But that will not save you. You can no longer wait for the wizard Frodo. They're coming",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf104"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf105",
            "dialog": "Into the wild",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf105"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf106",
            "dialog": "How do we know this Strider is a friend of Gandalf?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf106"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf107",
            "dialog": "I think a servant of the enemy would look fairer, but feel fouler.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf107"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf108",
            "dialog": "He's foul enough",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf108"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf109",
            "dialog": "We have no choice but to trust him",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf109"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10a",
            "dialog": "Yes, yes.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10a"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10b",
            "dialog": "They were once men. Great Kings of Men. The Sauron the Deciever gave to them nine rings of power. Blinded by their greed they took them without question. One by one falling into darkness,Now they are slaves to his will. They are the Nazg'l. Ringwraiths. Neither living nor dead. At all times they feel the presence of the Ring, Drawn to the power of the One, They will never stop hunting you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10b"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10c",
            "dialog": "I know, he'd probably come with me if I asked him to. I think in his heart Frodo's still in love with the Shire, the woods, the fields and the little rivers. I am old Gandalf. I know I don't look it, but I'm beginning to feel it in my heart. I feel thin, sort of stretched like butter scraped over too much bread. I need a holiday, a very long holiday. And I don't expect that I shall return. In fact, I mean not to.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10c"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10d",
            "dialog": "Where are you taking us?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10e",
            "dialog": "Old Toby, the finest weed in the Southfarthing.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10f",
            "dialog": "Gandalf my old friend, this will be a night to remember.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc38",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf10f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf110",
            "dialog": "What are they?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc15",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf110"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf111",
            "dialog": "He's very fond of you.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfea0",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf111"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf11d",
            "dialog": "But where is he leading us?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf11d"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf11e",
            "dialog": "To Rivendell Master Gamgee. To the House of Elrond.",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf11e"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf11f",
            "dialog": "D'you hear that! Rivendell! We're going to see the elves!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfd0d",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf11f"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf120",
            "dialog": "Gentlemen! We do not stop 'til nightfall",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf120"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf121",
            "dialog": "What about breakfast?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf121"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf122",
            "dialog": "You've already had it",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfbe6",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf122"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf123",
            "dialog": "We've had one yes. What about second breakfast?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf123"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf124",
            "dialog": "Don't think he knows about second breakfast Pippin",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf124"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf125",
            "dialog": "What about elvenses? Luncheon, Afternoon Tea, Dinner? Supper! He knows about them, doesnt he?",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfe2e",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf125"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf126",
            "dialog": "I wouldn't count on it",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf126"
        },
        {
            "_id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf127",
            "dialog": "Pippin!",
            "movie": "5cd95395de30eff6ebccde5c",
            "character": "5cd99d4bde30eff6ebccfc7c",
            "id": "5cd96e05de30eff6ebccf127"
        }
    ],
    "total": 507,
    "limit": 1000,
    "offset": 0,
    "page": 1,
    "pages": 1
}
